text: El Salitre is a town in the municipality of San Martín de Hidalgo in the state of Jalisco, Mexico. It has a population of 2,434 inhabitants.PueblosAmerica.com - El Salitre, San Martín Hidalgo, Jalisco ==Climate== Climate is characterized by relatively high temperatures and evenly distributed precipitation throughout the year, leading to very warm nights.Climate Summary for El Salitre, Mexico (State of Jalisco) The Köppen Climate Classification subtype for this climate is "Cfa" (Humid Subtropical Climate). ==References== ==External links== *El Salitre at PueblosAmerica.com Category:Populated places in Jalisco
title: El Salitre
